Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli reached 29/0 after just three overs.
Hardik Pandya hit a half-century off 27 balls.
Jasprit Bumrah made his inevitable breakthrough, tempting Najmul Hossain Shanto to the hands of Arshdeep Singh for 40 in the 16th over.
Arshdeep wrapped up the innings by removing the tenacious Mahmudullah, who had made his way to the crease in the 14th over and made 13 runs off 15 balls.
